original_text: ‘Manasseh, the king of Judah, has done terrible sins. He has done more evil things than the Amorites did, who lived in Canaan before him. He has caused the people of Judah to do wrong things as they worship his idols.
korean_text: 유다 왕 므낫세가 이 가증한 일과 악을 행함이 그 전에 있던 아모리 사람들의 행위보다 더욱 심하였고 또 그들의 우상으로 유다를 범죄하게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: He has done more evil things than the Amorites did
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아모리 사람들이 저지른 것보다 더 많은 악한 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: who lived in Canaan before him
He has caused the people of Judah
